CustomField.description: Human friendly and dynamic description of the SLA that covers both status and activity SLAs.
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( Status__c )), Status__c +IF(NOT(ISBLANK( StatusAfter__c )), " ➡️ " + StatusAfter__c, ""), CASE( Type__c, "ADVICE_DATA_ANALYSIS_COMPLETE", "Information requests | Ready for advice", "ADVICE_ALL_INFO_RECEIVED", "Information requests | Information received", "ADVICE_RISK_CALL_BOOK", "Risk call | Booked", "ADVICE_RISK_CALL_HOLD", "Risk call | Held", "Error: undefined, please raise a ticket"))
CustomField.label: Description
